titles.title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the National Labor Relations Board to assert jurisdiction in a labor dispute which occurs on Johnston Atoll, an unincorporated territory of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require the National Labor Relations Board to assert jurisdiction over a labor dispute which occurs on Johnston Atoll, an unincorporated territory of the United States.
